entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Chilliwack
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:33 p.m. PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening then light near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
